org.jpaste.utils.web

Class Post

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpaste.utils.web.Post

  • public class Post
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of a HTTP post

    Encodes parameters with the UTF-8 Charset.

    Reference manual

    Author:
    Brian B
